name: Tough Growth
description:
Description

Easy to learn, hard to master mouse only game. Eat smaller shapes to grow bigger and dodge bullets to work your way through the various increasingly challenging levels.

- DOES NOT RUN WELL ON MACINTOSH, MACINTOSH IS A LIE, TRY PLAYING ON WINDOWS OR LINUX

Making indie games is a tough growth. If you liked the game consider buying me a hot cocoa and share with your friends.

- DISCORD: https://discord.gg/MVGEbcR

Never stop growing,

—Sabooo 
@featherhatgames
